article.title: XIO Wins Defense Energy Support Center Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Defense Energy Support Center (DESC) has awarded XIO Strategies Inc. part of a five-year, $15 million contract that will be shared with several other firms. Under the contract, the company will support the DESC by improving the effectiveness and efficiency of managing the supply of bulk petroleum in both wartime and peacetime.
